edu.berkeley.nlp.lm.bits
Class BitStream

java.lang.Object
  edu.berkeley.nlp.lm.bits.BitStream

public final class BitStream
extends Object

Wraps a portion of a long[] array with iterator-like functionality over a stream of bits.

Author:
adampauls
